ygData.subject: Re: Area effect songs and Mistmoore...ACK
ygData.msgSnippet: it s not the walls, i have not been there for a while because the bug is a pet right near the zone, and if this pet is attacked everything from deep in the
ygData.messageBody:
it's not the walls, i have not been there for a while because the bug is a
pet right near the zone, and if this pet is attacked everything from deep in
the castle comes after you. is the pet still there?

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 3:16 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Area effect songs and Mistmoore...ACK


From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>

>From: OLadyNimue@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Area effect songs
>Date: Wed, 2 Jun 1999 17:31:32 EDT
>
>From: OLadyNimue@...
>
>This isn't related to the first question but it has something to do with
>Area
>Effect songs so I figured I'd continue with this header. My part hunted
>Mistmoore for the past 3 days and we hunt right at the zone. Well...either
>Mistmoore is bugged or my area song is hitting the npcs you hear casting
>through the walls, because we have had trouble with those same npcs coming
>to
>the zone and killing us all when we did nothing to provoke them. The AoE
>songs I used were fear, lull, and denon's. My only conclusion is that my
>song
>radius is reaching them, I tried to talk to a GM who just told me that
>higher
>lvl dungeons need a bit of tweaking. If anyone has any other information
>I'd
>love to hear from you.
>
>Sincerely,
>
>Summer Du'Soleil
>Bardess of Rodcet Nife

DAMN does this bug still exist???
I'm not looking forward to going to Mistmoore, but I will probly head there
around 20th because I'd love to own some lupine items.

Ever since beta3 Mistmoore has had a bug where if you brush or touch the
wall near zone (not sure which wall, I think the left one) it will cause a
train from back of zone to come kill you. It was VERY annoying. I hear
Tanara (a VERY nasty female DE vampire) used to be attracted to zone this
way. I also hear she is no longer in Mistmoore?

Anyways, one time this happened and she was stuck at zone (kinda like Dvinn
being stuck at zone in Crushbone, only FAR worse as she can charm you).
There were about 20 ppl outside afraid to go in because of her so we
petitioned a GM. Forget his name, but a 50th lvl wiz GM showed up, went
inside and shortly thereafter appeared in our midst naked, and muttering
"stupid wench..." So we all went in with him and helped kill her.

Not sure if the wall thing is what is happening to you, but I would suggest
NOT touching the walls, as the bug may still exist.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 15th Chorus
Veeshan
